nodes.text: Their voodoo fantasies were safe in Crawford.
The opposite point of view was not represented
This is the ferociously irresponsible crowd that has turned its back on simple arithmetic and thinks the answer to every economic question is a gigantic tax cut for the rich.
Only if there is somebody defending an opposite point of view they can change idea
They have not been confronted with reality and budgets an opposite point of view
There was no one at the ranch to chastise them for bequeathing backbreaking budget deficits to generations yet unborn.

And no one was there to confront them with evidence of the intense suffering that so many poor working-class and middle-class families are experiencing right now because of job losses on Mr. Bush's watch.
